scripts.package:change: pnpm changeset && git stage ./.changeset/* && git commit --m "feat: changeset" && git push
scripts.package:canary: pnpm changeset version --snapshot canary && git add -A; git commit --m "canary: changeset" && git push && changeset publish --tag canary && changeset tag && git push --follow-tags
scripts.package:release: pnpm run build && changeset version && pnpm --filter=!demo -r publish --access public && changeset tag && git push --follow-tags
scripts.build: pnpm run build:sdk && pnpm run build:hooks && pnpm run build:ui && pnpm run build:adapter
scripts.build:adapter: pnpm run -C packages/relay-ethers-wallet-adapter build && pnpm run -C packages/relay-svm-wallet-adapter build && pnpm run -C packages/relay-bitcoin-wallet-adapter build && pnpm run -C packages/relay-sui-wallet-adapter build
scripts.lint: pnpm run -C packages/ui lint && pnpm run -C packages/hooks lint
